source.name: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information (RCRAInfo)
source.description: The Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information (RCRAInfo) is used by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to track entities regulated under RCRAInfo subtitle C (hazardous waste handlers). RCRAInfo includes data on general handler information, permit or closure status, compliance with federal and state regulations, cleanup activities, financial assurance responsibilities and geospatial information.
